entities.name: goblin
entities.description: Griphook is described as a goblin who showed Harry to his vault at Gringotts.

entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: Harry is compared to a house-elf in terms of size.

entities.name: human
entities.description: Griphook compares Harry's domed head to that of a human.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is mentioned as the bank where Harry visited his vault.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as a famous person amongst goblins.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is introduced as the goblin who showed Harry to his vault at Gringotts.

relationships.description: Harry visited his vault at Gringotts, which is mentioned by Griphook as the first time Harry ever visited Gringotts.
Griphook showed Harry to his vault at Gringotts, which is mentioned by Griphook as the first time Harry ever visited Gringotts.
Griphook knew Harry Potter and remembered him.
